DOC.criteria: Healthy adult , men woman > 18 ≤ 45 year Totalcholesterol > 200 mg/dL < 300 mg/dL Age < 18 > 45 year Totalcholesterol ≥300 mg/dL Triglycerides > 250 mg/dL Totalcholesterol / HDLcholesterol > 6 Being usual consumer carbonic mineral water BMI < 20 > 30 kg/m2 Diabetes Hypertension digestive , liver renal disease Eating disorder Being medication could affect lipid metabolism Consumption functional food could affect lipid metabolism ( food contain n3 fatty acid phytosterols )
